quest.name: The Spirit Is Willing
journal: Guildmaster Hamon believes you are ready for your next lesson.
In order to train you to deal with immense foes, Hamon bids you challenge the toxic toads that nest at the Unholy Heir. As proof of this feat, you are required to obtain five toad legs.
You have obtained five toad legs. Present them to Hamon, who awaits you at Black Brush Station.

You learn that an illicit drug called somnus is being smuggled into Ul'dah via Black Brush Station. Instead of the lesson he had planned, Hamon bids you track down and apprehend the smugglers. Begin by gathering information from the people of the station.
You have acquired sufficient information on the smugglers. Report your findings to Hamon.
In all likelihood, the smugglers are operating out of an abandoned Qiqirn lair west of the Coffer & Coffin. Make your way to the lair, and there lie in wait for the criminals.

To everyone's surprise, it turns out that one of the smugglers is in fact Rurukuta, the missing pugilist. Upon discovering that his master had grown feeble, Rurukuta became disillusioned and decided to leave the guild. Speak with your guildmaster and learn his side of the story.

Beaten and despondent, Hamon admits that the ravages of age have robbed him of his former ability. There seems to be nothing you can do for your guildmaster at the moment. For now, make your way back to the guild, and discuss matters further with Chuchuto.

Despite having learned the truth of Hamon's condition, Chuchuto does not respect him any less. Determined to help her master and benefactor regain his former strength, she asks for your aid. Keep applying yourself to your training, that your improvement might rekindle the fires of passion within the guildmaster.

※The next pugilist quest will be available from Hamon upon reaching level 20.
objectives: Defeat toxic toads and obtain their legs.
Deliver toad legs to Hamon at Black Brush Station.
Gather information at Black Brush Station.
Lie in wait at the designated location.
Speak with Chuchuto at the Pugilists' Guild.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are, Forename! I hope you've come prepared for a lesson. Today, I want you to go and fight the toxic toads that nest at the Unholy Heir.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Make no mistake, lassson─these toads are huge, which means they have huge guts. But that's beside the point. The point is, you'll need to use your head to overcome them.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Thanks to their immense girth, these toads hit hard. Fortunately, they tend to hit wild as well, so bide your time and wait for an opening. And when that opening shows...thwack! Rip and tear through your foe with your fists!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: As proof that you've defeated the toads, I want you to bring me five of their legs. Chuchuto and I will be waiting for you at Black Brush Station. Your lesson continues there.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Defeat the toxic toads that nest at the Unholy Heir, and bring me five of their legs. Chuchuto and I will be waiting for you at Black Brush Station.

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: I'm taking part in today's lesson as well. Good luck to the both of us!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: So, did you bring me the toad legs?

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Aye, this is the stuff all right! <slurp> Now, I just need some butter, a slice of sun lemon, and a pinch of─

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: Um...Master?

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: ...Ahem. What I meant to say was, you've done well to defeat the toxic toads, Forename. For the next part of your lesson, you'll be putting your endurance to the test against─

dialogue.name: NANAJAPI
dialogue.text: <gasp> The talk was true! Hamon Holyfist is really here!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Hah hah hah! I can take nary a step outside the guild without being flocked by fans. Such is the price of fame!

dialogue.name: NANAJAPI
dialogue.text: Please, sir! I have grave need of your legendary skills! Somnus is being smuggled through Black Brush Station! I reported this to the Brass Blades and the Stone Torches─asked them to put an end to it─but they both turn a blind eye!

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: Somnus... That's the mind-warping substance made from dream flowers. Those who overindulge are said to fall into an eternal slumber.

dialogue.name: NANAJAPI
dialogue.text: A dear friend suffered that very fate─that's why I want to put an end to the smuggling. But I'm just an ordinary person, and there's precious little I can do...

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Hah hah hah! You've done enough to bring word to me, friend. For as surely as Hamon Holyfist is my name, I'll see the smuggler scum thrown in the dungeon before the bell is through!

dialogue.name: NANAJAPI
dialogue.text: Twelve bless you, sir! You truly are a hero to us all!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Hah hah hah! Slight change of plans, Forename. In place of the endurance test, we're going to find and apprehend the smugglers.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: But first, we must gather information. You two, find out what you can from the people of Black Brush Station. Report back once you've learned something.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Find out what you can from the people of Black Brush Station. Report back once you've learned something.

dialogue.name: ZUZUMEDA
dialogue.text: Searching for somnus smugglers, you say? Word is they are associated with the Alacran, a coalition of cold-blooded criminals. But beware─they always act in alliance!

dialogue.name: OSBERT
dialogue.text: There is an abandoned Qiqirn lair a short distance west of the Coffer & Coffin. Decent folk tend to give that place a wide berth. Ideal for a smuggling operation, wouldn't you say?

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: It appears a silver-haired Lalafell was seen skulking about the station recently. He was headed west, bearing a suspicious burden...

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: A silver-haired Lalafell... It couldn't possibly be him...could it?

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: The Alacran, a likely hideout, and a silver-haired Lalafell... I don't like the sound of this. Not one bit.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Like as not, the smugglers operate out of the abandoned Qiqirn lair west of the Coffer & Coffin. We'll lie in wait for them there.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Like as not, the smugglers operate out of the abandoned Qiqirn lair west of the Coffer & Coffin. We'll lie in wait for them there.

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: The silver-haired Lalafell─I must see who he is with my own eyes. Let us go to the abandoned Qiqirn lair!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Thal's balls! Th-That's...

dialogue.name: ZANTOU
dialogue.text: Gahaha... We've really outdone ourselves this time. Master Weggfarr's bound to be pleased.

dialogue.name: RURUKUTA
dialogue.text: (-Silver-haired Lalafell-)Save the talk. We have crates to move.

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: Rurukuta! It is you, isn't it!?

dialogue.name: RURUKUTA
dialogue.text: Chuchuto...and Master. It's been a while.

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: You vanish from the guild with nary a word, and we find you here smuggling somnus with those villains!? What is the meaning of this!?

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Rurukuta, my boy. I didn't teach you how to fight so that you could become a pox on society. My student or no, you must be held accountable.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Chuchuto, Forename, your lesson begins! Apprehend the smugglers!

dialogue.name: RURUKUTA
dialogue.text: You lot, take care of these meddlers!

dialogue.name: ZANTOU
dialogue.text: (-Servant of the Alacran-)Hamon Holyfist!? Just our luck...

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: If you know who I am, then you'll know what's good for you. Come quietly, or there will be trouble.

dialogue.name: RURUKUTA
dialogue.text: Holyfist? Don't make me laugh! You're being fooled, all of you!

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: Who's fooling who? What in the world are you talking about?

dialogue.name: RURUKUTA
dialogue.text: It was a dark night several moons ago. I was out in the wilds, training alone.

dialogue.name: RURUKUTA
dialogue.text: From a distance, I caught sight of Master leaving the tavern and turning for the city. Thinking to accompany him back, I followed on his heels, and was about to call out when I...when I saw...this.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Hm? You would challenge the Holyfist? You have fighting spirit, I'll grant you that, but you'd do well to know your limits.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: So be it! Yaaarrrgh!

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: M-Master?

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: <huff> <puff> You read my every move... You're no ordinary marmot...

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: Master!!!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: <gasp> All I wanted...was to be surrounded by scantily clad maidens...when my time came... <sigh> The gods are cruel...

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: Master! What is the meaning of this!? Explain yourself!

dialogue.name: RURUKUTA
dialogue.text: Now you've seen it with your own eyes! Master was beaten by a marmot─a common bleeding marmot! He would remind us how strong he was at every turn, but he was lying through his teeth!

dialogue.name: ZANTOU
dialogue.text: (-Servant of the Alacran-)Gahaha! I can scarce believe my eyes! Wait till Master Weggfarr learns of this!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Forgive me, Chuchuto, Forename... I didn't mean to deceive anyone...least of all my students.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Hamon Holyfist conquered every foe that stood before him, but he couldn't conquer old age. My strength, my reflexes, my endurance─they've all left me. There's nothing here but a decrepit old man.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: I would be alone for a while. I'll make my own way back to the guild. From now on, you're to do as Chuchuto bids, Forename.

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: I can't believe it... When─how did Master become so weak?

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: I would be alone for a while. I'll make my own way back to the guild. From now on, you're to do as Chuchuto bids, Forename.

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: I've been doing some thinking, Forename. While 'tis true that Master had been deceiving us, he meant us no harm.

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: Besides, I owe him my life. Had he not taken me in all those years ago, I would have died in some ditch. I could never bring myself to hate him. Even if he were an ordinary old man, I would still respect him.

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: Alas, with the truth of his condition revealed, Master Hamon has lost his sense of purpose─his will to teach. I cannot bear to see him like this. I want him to regain his confidence, but for this he needs to regain his former strength.

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: Listen, Forename. Master ever said that you remind him of his younger self. Were you to continue showing rapid improvement, I dare to hope that it would rekindle his fighting spirit.

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: To this end, I will teach you a new technique, one which Master Hamon used to great effect during his prizefighting days.

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: Steel Peak, it's called, and it sees you channel your gathered chakra into a powerful attack performed with your entire body.

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: Make this technique your own, Forename, and strive to grow stronger still. When next Master Hamon beholds you, he will surely be moved to action!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Show them the fruit of your training, Forename!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Have no fear! We're students of Hamon Holyfist!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: The marmots are all yours, Forename!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Ware the marauders' sweeping swings!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: The enemy pugilists hit hard! Stay light on your feet!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
Useless, the whole bloody lot of them...
Best we flee for now.

dialogue.name: SCENE00012
dialogue.text:
Duty calls. Do you wish to proceed with
“The Spirit Is Willing”?

dialogue.name: SCENE00012
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: SCENE00012
dialogue.text: No
